product1.title: Medicine For Diabetes
product1.content: Galvus Met 50mg/500mg Tablet is a combination of two medicines that control high blood sugar levels in people with type 2 diabetes mellitus
product1.detial: manufactured: Novartis Pharma AG, Basel, Switzerland

product2.title: Medicine For Pressrures
product2.content: Norvasc(Amlodipine) is a calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension)

product3.title: Medicine For Goiter
product3.content: Euthyrox 25 Tablet is a medicine used to treat an underactive thyroid gland (hypothyroidism). It replaces the hormone which is not being produced by your thyroid gland in sufficient quantity.

product4.title: Medicine For Asmath
product4.content: Ventolin is a kind of inhaler that uses the active ingredient salbutamol, otherwise known as albuterol.They can help to prevent and treat feelings like shortness of breath and symptoms such as wheezing or choking.
product4.detial: manufactured: GlaxoSmithKline, the manufacturer of Ventolin HFA

product5.title: Medicine For Skins
product5.content: Flucort Skin Cream belongs to a group of medicine called steroids. It is used in the treatment of skin conditions associated with inflammation and itching.
product5.detial: manufactured: GlaxoSmithKline, the manufacturer of Ventolin HFA

product6.title: Medicine For Eyes
product6.content: Flucort Skin Cream belongs to a group of medicine called steroids. It is used in the treatment of skin conditions associated with inflammation and itching.

product7.title: Medicine for Gastro
product7.content: Nexium Control 20 mg gastro-resistant tablets treats to reflux symptoms (heartburn, acid regurgitation) in adults, aged 18 years or over.
product7.detial: Manufactured: GSK Consumer Healthcare (UK) Trading Ltd., Brentford, TW8 9GS

product8.title: Devices
product8.content: The CareSens N blood glucose monitoring system measures blood glucose quickly and accurately.
